name: Beat Ball - A Music Based Game
name_original: Beat Ball - A Music Based Game
description:
Jump as high as you can. Try to follow music beats and don't fall down.
Beat Ball is music rhythm based game with awesome graphics and cool music

Game features:
- Unique BPM/rhythm based game
- Colorful graphics and design
- Different unlockable cool musics
- Cool unlockable balls and platforms
- Endless and addictive gameplay
- Optimized for iPhone X
